// client/src/pages/Home.tsx (or client/src/pages/AuthenticationFlow.tsx) 'use client' // 1. IMPORT: Import useNavigate from React Router DOM import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from '../../components/ui/button' import SafeIcon from '../../components/common/SafeIcon' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function AuthenticationFlow() { const navigate = useNavigate() // 2. INITIALIZE: Get the navigate function const [isClient, setIsClient] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setIsClient(true) }, []) // 3. HANDLER FIX: Use navigate('/login') instead of window.location.href const handleLoginClick = () => { navigate('/login') // Redirects to the route handled by Login.tsx } // 4. HANDLER FIX: Use navigate('/signup') instead of window.location.href const handleSignupClick = () => { navigate('/signup') // Redirects to the route handled by Signup.tsx } return (
{/* Header Section */}

Welcome to LearnHub

Your gateway to quality education and skill development. Join thousands of learners and instructors on our platform.

Login

Already have an account? Sign in to access your courses, progress, and personalized learning experience.

{/* Signup Card */}

Sign Up

New to LearnHub? Create an account to start your learning journey and explore our comprehensive course catalog.

{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose LearnHub?

Diverse Courses

Access hundreds of courses across various subjects and skill levels.

Expert Instructors

Learn from industry professionals and experienced educators.

Certifications

Earn recognized certificates upon course completion.
